text: Ezzatolah Entezami (, June 21, 1924 - August 17, 2018) was an Iranian actor. He was born in Tehran, Iran. His first role was as Masht Hassan in the 1969 movie The Cow. He later appeared in many movies such as Mr. Naive, Hamoun, and in 40 Years Old. He also appeared in the television series Hezar Dastan. Entezami died in Tehran on August 17, 2018 from complications of a stroke at the age of 94. ==References== ==Other websites== * * An interview with Ezzatollah Entezami in connection with the recently produced biopic "... and the Blue Sky", directed by Ghazaleh Soltani and produced by Ghasem Gholipour, Mehr News Agency, 21 November 2010, (in Persian). title: Ezzatolah Entezami
